text: The Kazakh ambassador in Washington, D. C. is the official representative of the Government in Astana to the Government of the United States and is concurrently accredited in Brasilia. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément !| Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Observations !| Prime Minister of Kazakhstan !| List of Presidents of the United States !| Term end |- |- | | | |– diplomatic relations established between the United States and the Republic of Kazakhstan |Sergey Tereshchenko |George H. We were unable to process him until such time as new President was sworn in. |Kassym-Jomart Tokayev |George W. Bush | |- | | |Erlan Idrissov | |Karim Massimov |George W. title: List of ambassadors of Kazakhstan to the United States
